prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a stoic Japanese martial artist, messy black hair, red headband, intense gaze, wearing a weathered white cotton karate gi
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, visible fabric weave, sweat on skin, facial stubble, realistic skin pores, cinematic dojo lighting
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, clean clothes, smooth skin, glowing eyes, magic effects
